comprehensive_overview: Scikit-learn is a machine learning library for Python that provides simple and efficient tools for data mining and data analysis. It is built on NumPy, SciPy, and matplotlib.
core_features: Scikit-learn provides various supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms, including linear and logistic regression, support vector machines, random forests, k-means clustering, and principal component analysis. It also offers tools for model selection, preprocessing, dimensionality reduction, and evaluation.
